name: PublicationEvent
description: A PublicationEvent corresponds indifferently to the event of publication for a CreativeWork of any type e.g. a broadcast event, an on-demand event, a book/journal publication via a variety of delivery media.
title: PublicationEvent

fields.name: publishedOn
fields.title: publishedOn
fields.description: A broadcast service associated with the publication event.

fields.name: free
fields.title: free
fields.description: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

fields.title: isAccessibleForFree
fields.description: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.
